snippet: Even with a report that a growing number of Fed officials were willing to raise interest rates, the market rose for a third straight day.
abstract: Stock market rises for third straight day despite report from Federal Reserve that shows growing number of central bank officials are willing to raise interest rates sooner rather than later.
lead_paragraph: Even with a report that a growing number of Fed officials were willing to raise interest rates, the market rose for a third straight day.

headline.main: Talk of Higher Interest Rates Doesn’t Deter the Market
headline.print_headline: Talk of Higher Interest Rates Doesn’t Deter the Market
